name: Questions
body: # Questions Quiz app for iOS with support for multiple languages and dark theme. Screenshots ------- [More](http://imgur.com/gallery/iRwBD) # ASSETS # Images ------- App background: https://pixabay.com/en/banner-header-question-mark-1090830/ Sounds ------- Royalty Free Music from Bensound: http://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/funky-element 'Correct answer' sound: https://www.freesound.org/people/LittleRainySeasons/sounds/335908/ 'Incorrect answer' sound': https://www.freesound.org/people/rhodesmas/sounds/342756/ # Special thanks to # Carlos Rodriguez ([**@carlosrodriguez85**](https://github.com/carlosrodriguez85)) Jared Davidson for the "Making A Quiz Game" [tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dyxqsfrCaeM)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
